title: Does a man have to be more religious then his wife?
transcript: [Music] no it's not necessarily for a man to be more religious than his wife and it's not uh a must for a wife to be more religious than her husband they both have to be religious but you cannot have it tailor made you cannot go and make your own life to the way you want it is recommended that the man has more religion than his wife so that he would uplift her but what happen if a man proposed to a woman who is knowledgeable and who is working hard for dawa for example must the man be superior to his wife even in this this is not always Poss and Allah Knows Best
